title: C.S. Lewis: ASM aRticle
description:
On this bonus episode of Sleep & Relax ASMR, I gently read the Wiki page for C.S. Lewis, in a specially requested ASM aRticle.

Clive Staples Lewis (29 November 1898 – 22 November 1963) was a British writer.  He is best known for his works of fiction, especially The Screwtape Letters, The Chronicles of Narna, and the Space Triology, and for his non-fiction Christian apologetics, such as Mere Christianity, Miracles, and the Problem of Pain.
